testcase.name: should inject a substyle instance for the `style` prop
should merge styles provided by the component user with default styles
should also work if a substyle instance is provided as `style`
should accept a function mapping props to default styles as first argument
should take a modifier selection function as second argument
should apply the selected modifiers also on the style supplied by the user
should give precendence to styles supplied by the user, regardless the modifiers specificity
should support depency injection via context for additional HOC to wrap the component
should fix `style` prop type if injected HOC defines (as Radium does)
should expose the wrapped component instance via `getWrappedInstance`
should support providing a props decorator function via context
